original_title: Doctor Who: The Evil of the Daleks
overview: The Daleks draft the Second Doctor into distilling the Human Factor. Once implanted, it will make the Dalek race invincible. Jamieâ€™s faith in the Doctor is stretched to the limit as the Doctor appears to be collaborating with the Daleks. The Doctor has a few tricks up his sleeve, but then again so might the Daleks.
title: Doctor Who: The Evil of the Daleks
